mapper.insert: UPDATE TB_TREATMENT SET treat_content = #{treatContent}, write_yn = 'Y' WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.treat_date, t.treat_content, me.name as patient_name, me.uuid, me.rrn, me.name AS doctor_name FROM TB_TREATMENT t JOIN TB_RECEPTION r ON t.uuid = r.uuid JOIN TB_MEMBER me ON me.uuid = r.doctor_uuid WHERE t.id = #{treatmentId}
